about_the_game:
A World Lost to Time—A Hero Forged in the Ashes

Long after the final war reduced civilization to ruins, something else rose from the wreckage. When the dust settled, monstrous creatures emerged from the wilds, cutting off the last human settlements from one another and ensuring that the age of progress would never rise again. Cities crumbled, technology was lost, and what remained of humanity was left to struggle, isolated and afraid.

But fate has other plans.

Meet Roc, an 18-year-old Junk Collector scraping by in the island slums of the once-great Isle of Elimis. In a world where survival is everything, he lives by salvaging the remnants of a forgotten age. Until the day he discovers something far more valuable than scrap, an artifact of unimaginable power.

It fuses with him, unlocking mysterious new abilities and a connection to something far greater than he could ever comprehend. But more than that, it gives him the power to fight back.

For the first time in his life, Roc sees a future where his people don’t have to live in fear. Where the monsters that stalk the night can be slain. Where the world can be reclaimed.

Now, armed with his newfound strength, Roc must set out on an epic journey to reunite humanity, uncover the truth behind the monsters, and forge a new future.

Uncover the Secrets of a Forgotten Age

Scattered across an endless, untamed landscape, the remnants of humanity’s golden era lie in ruin. Once-thriving cities have become haunted graveyards, lost technologies remain buried beneath the earth, and an unknown force festers in the wilds, waiting to strike.

The world is broken. But not beyond saving.

Join Roc as he masters his newfound powers, travels across breathtaking yet treacherous lands, and forges alliances, and rivalries, with those he meets along the way. Every ruin holds a secret. Every battle brings him closer to the truth. What will he uncover?

Recruit Allies to Aid You in Battle

The fight to reclaim the world isn’t one Roc can win alone. Along his journey, he’ll meet larger-than-life warriors, rebels, and wanderers, each with their own battles to fight and ghosts to bury.

Earn their trust. Learn their stories. Recruit them to your cause.

Call allies into battle, each bringing unique abilities and devastating attacks to the fight. Strengthen your bonds through shared struggles, unleashing their full potential as friendships deepen. The stronger your team, the stronger your chance of survival.

Annihilate Those Who Stand in Your Way

Unleash unrelenting devastation with a high-speed, precision-based combat system built to obliterate anything in your path.

Master fighting game-style combos, aerial hit chains, and explosive energy attacks, stringing together devastating assaults that leave enemies in pieces. With fast-paced movement and pinpoint accuracy, nothing can stand between you and total domination.

The world won’t save itself. Carve a path through those who dare stand in your way.

A Breathtaking World Across Unique Terrains

Every step of Roc’s journey takes him through a beautifully hand-drawn, fully realized world, where each biome is alive with its own stories, dangers, and mysteries.

Explore lush overgrown ruins, scorching wastelands, frozen tundras, neon-lit city remnants, vast rolling plains, treacherous lava caverns, and bustling slum towns—all brought to life with state-of-the-art animation and breathtaking visual effects.

Lose yourself in a world that feels vast, immersive, and alive. Every ruin has a story. Every step brings you closer to the truth.

Are you ready to embark on the odyssey?

short_description: Explore vast landscapes and get lost in a beautiful yet dangerous world in Roc's Odyssey. Filled with intense combat, strange allies, platforming, enemies, treasures, secrets, upgrades, friendships and lore this hand drawn action adventure will have you hooked!
